    public class DailyGoalsUI
extends javax.swing.JDialog
    Class that displays the contents of daily goals component including creating a goal, switching the date, and removing a goal
    Author:
    Team 18

      • test

        private Data test(Data dat,
                  java.lang.Boolean test)
        Test method, used to determine if the data is API Data or Test Data
        Parameters:
        dat - The Data
        test - Boolean value to determine what type of data to use
        Returns:
        If test is true, then TestData; otherwise, APIData
